mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT ON (id) p.id , p.name , p.description , p.create_date as "createDate" , p.modify_date as "modifyDate" , p.status , p.resource_img_id as "resourceImgId" , p.category_id as "categoryId" , p.web_show as "webShow" , p.mobile_show as "mobileShow" , pdf.product_detials_id as "productDetialsId" , c."name" as "categoryName" , (SELECT u.user_name FROM user_ u WHERE u.id = p.create_by) as "createBy" , (SELECT u.user_name FROM user_ u WHERE u.id = p.modify_by) as "modifyBy" FROM product p INNER JOIN category c on c.id = p.category_id LEFT JOIN product_details_references pdf on p.id = pdf.product_id where p.status != #{status}
